titleStmt.title: Zenexton ante-pestilentiale. Or, A short discourse of the plague its antidotes and cure, according to the placets of the best of physicians, Hippocrates, Paracelsus, and Helmont. By W. Simpson, Philo-Medico-Chymic.
titleStmt.author: Simpson, William, M.D.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Sawbridge, at the sign of the Bible upon Ludgate-hill,

notesStmt.note: "Hippocrates ... Helmont" connected by right and left brace.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible upon Ludgate-hill
